data.name: ImageCrop_DisplayName
data.value: RAW! Image Crop

data.name: ImageCrop_Rotation_DisplayName
data.value: Rotation (degrees)

data.name: ImageCrop_Scaling_DisplayName
data.value: Scaling (zoom)

data.name: ImageCrop_Aspect_Description
data.value: The aspect ratio of the crop, e.g. 1 for a square or 16/9 for landscape. Leave blank for freeform crop.

data.name: ImageCrop_MinWidth_Description
data.value: The minimum crop width in pixels.

data.name: ImageCrop_MinHeight_Description
data.value: The minimum crop height in pixels.

data.name: ImageCrop_MaxWidth_Description
data.value: The maximum crop width in pixels.

data.name: ImageCrop_MaxHeight_Description
data.value: The maximum crop height in pixels.

data.name: ImageCrop_KeepSelection_Description
data.value: If true, the crop selection cannot be disabled by clicking outside the area.

data.name: ImageCrop_Disabled_Description
data.value: If true, the user cannot resize or draw a new crop.

data.name: ImageCrop_Locked_Description
data.value: If true, the user cannot create or resize a crop, but can still drag the existing crop.

data.name: ImageCrop_RuleOfThirds_Description
data.value: Show rule of thirds lines in the crop area.

data.name: ImageCrop_CircularCrop_Description
data.value: Show the crop area as a circle. If aspect is not 1, the circle will be an oval.

data.name: ImageCrop_ImageInput_Description
data.value: The Base64 content of the image to be cropped.

data.name: ImageCrop_ImageOutput_Description
data.value: The cropped image as a Base64 string.

data.name: ImageCrop_Rotation_Description
data.value: Rotate the image by the specified number of degrees (e.g. 0, 90, 180, 270).

data.name: ImageCrop_Scaling_Description
data.value: Scale (zoom) the image in the crop area. 1 is normal, 2 is 2x zoom, 0.5 is half size, etc.

data.name: ImageCrop_Description
data.value: A simple Power Apps PCF control for cropping images and returning the cropped image as base64.
